SourceString: Onboarding Objective {number}:
Build the HUB
Objective-Based Introduction
Context: Replaces the Onboarding/Container/Objective string during Landing objective

SourceString: Pioneer Obligatory Onboarding Program

You are now a certified Pioneer Obligatory Onboarding Program finisher.

Well done.
Congratulations.
Tips:
Use to look
Use {PlayerMovement_LookAxisX} to look around.
Use to move
Use {PlayerMovement_Forward} {PlayerMovement_Left} {PlayerMovement_Back} {PlayerMovement_Right} to move.
VariableDescription:
{PlayerMovement_Forward} = text, key name
{PlayerMovement_Left} = text, key name
{PlayerMovement_Back} = text, key name
{PlayerMovement_Right} = text, key name

SourceString: Dismantle the Drop Pod
Press {PlayerInterfaceActions_Dismantle} to enter Dismantle Mode.
Press to enter Dismantle Mode.
While in Dismantle Mode, hold {PlayerActions_PrimaryFire} to Dismantle.
While in Dismantle Mode, hold to Dismantle.
Equip the Xeno-Zapper
Press {PlayerInterfaceActions_ToggleInventory} to open the Inventory.
Press to open the Inventory.
Drag and drop Equipment to a Hands slot to equip it.
Press on Equipment to equip it.
Build the HUB
An efficient pioneer would build the HUB near Iron Nodes.
Context: Previously: To improve efficiency, the HUB should initially be built near Iron Nodes.

SourceString: Further instructions on how to use the Build Menu can be found below the menu.
Press {PlayerInterfaceActions_BuildMenu} to open the Build Menu.
Press to open the Build Menu.
Complete HUB Upgrade 1
HUB Upgrades and their costs can be found and activated in the HUB Terminal.
Parts, like Iron Rods, can be crafted at the Crafting Bench in the HUB.
Complete HUB Upgrade 2
The Equipment Workshop is used to craft Equipment, like the Portable Miner.
Press {PlayerInterfaceActions_Dismantle} to enter Dismantle Mode. Buildings can be Dismantled without any loss of resources.
Context: Only used in HUB Upgrade 3 now…

SourceString: Use {PlayerActions_CycleEquipmentNext}/{PlayerActions_CycleEquipmentPrevious} to swap between Hand Equipment.
VariableDescription:
{PlayerActions_CycleEquipmentNext} = text, key name
{PlayerActions_CycleEquipmentPrevious} = text, key name

SourceString: Hold to swap between Hand Equipment.
Complete HUB Upgrade 3
Hold to bring up the Resource Scanner.
Production Buildings like the Smelter will only function when connected to a power source with a Power Line.
Press to enter Dismantle Mode. Buildings can be Dismantled without any loss of resources.
The Biomass Burner located in the HUB generates power by consuming biomass, such as Wood and Leaves.
Complete HUB Upgrade 4
Production Buildings like the Constructor will only function when connected to a power source with a Power Line.
All data on Recipes, Buildings, and Messages is stored in the Codex. The Codex can be accessed via the menu
Power Poles can be used to connect multiple buildings to the same power grid.
All data on Recipes, Buildings, and Messages is stored in the Codex. To open the Codex press {PlayerInterfaceActions_ToggleCodex}.
Complete HUB Upgrade 5
Conveyor Belts are used to fully automate resource transportation between buildings.
Buildings have specific input and output ports to connect Conveyor Belts.
Conveyor Belts cannot be connected to Portable Miners.
Complete HUB Upgrade 6
Ensure Resource Nodes are clear of clutter before placing a Miner Mk.1.
Multiple Biomass Burners can be connected to the same power grid to increase capacity.
Some Buildings, like the Storage Container, don't need power to function.
Initializing...
Onboarding Complete
Gather Iron Ore
The locations of scanned Resource Nodes will appear on the HUD compass.
Press {ResourceScanner_Scan} to quickly scan again.
Context: Previously: Press {ResourceScanner_Scan} to quickly rescan the previously selected resource.

SourceString: Press to quickly scan again.
Hold {ResourceScanner_Scan} to bring up the Resource Scanner.
Hold to bring up the Resource Scanner.
Select Iron and release {ResourceScanner_Scan} to scan for Iron Nodes.
Select Iron and release to scan for Iron Nodes.
